functions.name: RGBA
functions.description: Creates a color value from red, green, blue, and alpha components.

parameters.name: red
parameters.description: The red component of the color.

parameters.name: green
parameters.description: The green component of the color.

parameters.name: blue
parameters.description: The blue component of the color.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: The alpha (transparency) component of the color.

errors.message: The parameter must be a number.
